price: ߡߍ߲ ߛߌߟߊ߲߫ ߘߊ߫ ߡߊ߬ߤߌ߬ߣߊ߬ߟߊ ߢߍ߫ ߘߏ߲߰ ߘߐ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߣߊ߬ ߛߣߐ߬ߡߍ߫ ߖߘߍ߬ߟߛߊ߬ߦߌ߬ߟߊ ߘߌ߫
arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: man khashiya al-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi wajāa biqalbin munībin
